title: Vision Of Triumph
description: A powerful, must-read story that you'll enjoy with each page. Set yourself into an amazing read of all time. Howard, a wealthy thirty-year-old introvert, is served divorce papers from his wife Cindy. Howardâ€™s sister Melinda, struggling to rehabilitate from years of drug abuse, consoles him. But in doing so she recalls their past and hints that they share a hellish childhood secret. Her words uncover a memory Howard long ago suppressed, and now he must confront his new reality.
author: Amanda Tee Hocking
